\mbox{\bf IVM} = \mbox{\bf I} \times \mbox{\bf I}

\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{letrec}}\:\mbox{\it seek\/} = \lambda \mbox{\it f\/}^{\ast} \mbox{\it u\/}. \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it f\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle \rangle \newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it f\/} = \mbox{\it f\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{and}}\:\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast} = \mbox{\it seek\/}(\mbox{\it f\/}^{\ast}\dagger1, \mbox{\it u\/})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent

\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle \mbox{\it f\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize value}}\rangle \S\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent

 \setandincrindent

 \setandincrindent

% tag::SymToks_for_IVM[]
\mbox{\it SymToks\_for\_IVM\/}(\mbox{\it i\/}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf IVM} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SymTok*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:(\mbox{\it i\/} = \mbox{\it IVM\_1\_0\/})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it SYM0\/}), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt \$ion}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt \$ion\_1\_0}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt \$ion\_symbol\_table}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt name}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt version}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt imports}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt symbols}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt max\_id}''})), \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Unicode}}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt \$ion\_shared\_symbol\_table}''}))\rangle \newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it raise\/}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt Unsupported Ion version}''})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::SymToks_for_IVM[]

% tag::compile_SST[]
\mbox{\it compile\_SST\/}(\mbox{\it s\/}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Struct} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SharedSymtab}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} = \mbox{\it s\/} \odot \mbox{\rm ``{\tt name}''}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf String}}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Unicode}}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{and}}\:\mbox{\it v\/} = \mbox{\it s\/} \odot \mbox{\rm ``{\tt version}''}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Int}}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf I}}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SharedSymtab}}(\langle \mbox{\it n\/}, \mbox{\it v\/}, {\cal C}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt symbols}}(\mbox{\it s\/})\rangle ) \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::compile_SST[]

% tag::Catalog_lookup[]
\mbox{\it Catalog\_lookup\/}(\mbox{\it c\/}, \mbox{\it name\/}, \mbox{\it version\/}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Catalog} \times \mbox{\bf Unicode} \times \mbox{\bf I} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SharedSymtab*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{letrec}}\:\mbox{\it seek\/} = \lambda \mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast} \mbox{\it n\/} \mbox{\it v\/} \mbox{\it b\/}^{\ast}. \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it b\/}^{\ast}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it sst\/} = \mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} = \mbox{\it sst\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize name}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it v\/} = \mbox{\it sst\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize version}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle \mbox{\it sst\/}\rangle \newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it b\/}^{\ast}=0\ \vee\ \mbox{\it b\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize version}} < \mbox{\it sst\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize version}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it seek\/}(\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}\dagger1, \mbox{\it n\/}, \mbox{\it v\/}, \langle \mbox{\it sst\/}\rangle )\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it seek\/}(\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}\dagger1, \mbox{\it n\/}, \mbox{\it v\/}, \mbox{\it b\/}^{\ast})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it seek\/}(\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}\dagger1, \mbox{\it n\/}, \mbox{\it v\/}, \mbox{\it b\/}^{\ast})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\:\mbox{\it seek\/}(\mbox{\it c\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf SharedSymtab*}}}, \mbox{\it name\/}, \mbox{\it version\/}, \langle \rangle ) \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::Catalog_lookup[]

% tag::symbol_padding[]
\mbox{\it symbol\_padding\/}(\mbox{\it n\/}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf I} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SymTok*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} = 0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle\rangle\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\langle \mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it SYM0\/})\rangle \S\mbox{\it symbol\_padding\/}(\mbox{\it n\/} - 1)\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::symbol_padding[]
\newline
\newline
% tag::adjust_length[]
\mbox{\it adjust\_length\/}(\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}, \mbox{\it n\/}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf SymTok*} \times \mbox{\bf I} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SymTok*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} < \#\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it seq\_truncate\/}(\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}, \mbox{\it n\/})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast}\S\mbox{\it symbol\_padding\/}(\mbox{\it n\/} - \#\mbox{\it s\/}^{\ast})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::adjust_length[]
\newline
\newline
% tag::normalize_name[]
{\cal N}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt name}}(\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Value*} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf Unicode}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle\rangle\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it c\/} = \mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf String}\ \wedge\ \lnot \mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf DotNull}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it c\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf String}}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Unicode}}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\langle\rangle\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::normalize_name[]
\newline
\newline
% tag::normalize_version[]
{\cal N}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt version}}(\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Value*} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf I}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:1\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it c\/} = \mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf Int}\ \wedge\ \lnot \mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf DotNull}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it i\/} = \mbox{\it c\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Int}}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf I}}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it i\/} < 1\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:1\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it i\/}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:1\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::normalize_version[]
\newline
\newline
% tag::normalize_max_id[]
{\cal N}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt max\_id}}(\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Value*} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf I*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle \rangle \newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it c\/} = \mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf Int}\ \wedge\ \lnot \mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf DotNull}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} = \mbox{\it c\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Int}}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf I}}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} < 0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle \rangle \newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\langle \mbox{\it n\/}\rangle \newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\langle \rangle \newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::normalize_max_id[]
\newline
\newline
% tag::compile_import[]
{\cal C}_{\mbox{\scriptsize import}}(\mbox{\it s\/}, \rho) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Struct} \times \mbox{\bf Environment} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SymTok*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} = {\cal N}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt name}}(\mbox{\it s\/} \odot \mbox{\rm ``{\tt name}''})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{and}}\:\mbox{\it v\/} = {\cal N}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt version}}(\mbox{\it s\/} \odot \mbox{\rm ``{\tt version}''})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{and}}\:\mbox{\it m\/} = {\cal N}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt max\_id}}(\mbox{\it s\/} \odot \mbox{\rm ``{\tt max\_id}''})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{and}}\:\mbox{\it c\/} = \rho\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize catalog}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it n\/} = \mbox{\rm ``{\tt }''}\ \vee\ \mbox{\it n\/} = \mbox{\rm ``{\tt \$ion}''}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle\rangle\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it found\/} = \mbox{\it Catalog\_lookup\/}(\mbox{\it c\/}, \mbox{\it n\/}, \mbox{\it v\/})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it found\/}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it m\/}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it raise\/}(\mbox{\it display\_to\_string\/}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt No exact-match for }''}, \mbox{\it n\/}, \mbox{\rm ``{\tt  @}''}, \mbox{\it v\/}))\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it symbol\_padding\/}(\mbox{\it m\/}\!\downarrow_{0})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it best\/} = \mbox{\it found\/}\!\downarrow_{0}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it v\/} = \mbox{\it best\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize version}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it m\/}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it best\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize symbols}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it adjust\_length\/}(\mbox{\it best\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize symbols}}, \mbox{\it m\/}\!\downarrow_{0})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it m\/}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it raise\/}(\mbox{\it display\_to\_string\/}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt No exact-match for }''}, \mbox{\it n\/}, \mbox{\rm ``{\tt  @}''}, \mbox{\it v\/}))\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it adjust\_length\/}(\mbox{\it best\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize symbols}}, \mbox{\it m\/}\!\downarrow_{0})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::compile_import[]
\newline
\newline
% tag::compile_imports[]
{\cal C}_{\mbox{\scriptsize import}}^{\ast}(\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}, \rho) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Value*} \times \mbox{\bf Environment} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SymTok*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle\rangle\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it c\/} = \mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast} =  \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf Struct}\ \wedge\ \lnot \mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf DotNull}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:{\cal C}_{\mbox{\scriptsize import}}(\mbox{\it c\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Struct}}}, \rho)\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\langle\rangle\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast}\S{\cal C}_{\mbox{\scriptsize import}}^{\ast}(\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\dagger1, \rho) \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent

% end::compile_imports[]

% tag::imported_symbols[]
{\cal C}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\tt imports}}(\mbox{\it s\/}, \rho) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf Struct} \times \mbox{\bf Environment} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf SymTok*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast} = \mbox{\it s\/} \odot \mbox{\rm ``{\tt imports}''}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{and}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast} = \mbox{\it SymToks\_for\_IVM\/}(\rho\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize IVM}})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it Value\_is\_symbol\_matching\/}(\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}, \mbox{\rm ``{\tt \$ion\_symbol\_table}''})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\rho\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize symbols}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it c\/} = \mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf List}\ \wedge\ \lnot \mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf DotNull}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast}\S{\cal C}_{\mbox{\scriptsize import}}^{\ast}(\mbox{\it c\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf List}}}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize elts}}, \rho)\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::imported_symbols[]

 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\#\mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}=0\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle\rangle\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it c\/} = \mbox{\it v\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{0}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it t\/} =  \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf String}\ \wedge\ \lnot \mbox{\it c\/}\in \mbox{\bf DotNull}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it c\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf String}}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Unicode}}})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it SYM0\/})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent

\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\langle \rangle \newline

% tag::E_RContent[]
{\cal E}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\bf RContent}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}, \rho) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf RContent} \times \mbox{\bf Environment} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf Content}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf RSymbol}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}({\cal E}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\bf RSymbol}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf RSymbol}}}, \rho))\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf RList}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}({\cal E}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\bf RList}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf RList}}}, \rho))\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf RSexp}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}({\cal E}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\bf RSexp}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf RSexp}}}, \rho))\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf RStruct}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}({\cal E}_{\mbox{\scriptsize\bf RStruct}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf RStruct}}}, \rho))\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf NullNull}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf NullNull}}})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf Bool}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Bool}}})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf Int}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Int}}})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it rv\/}\in \mbox{\bf String}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf Content}}(\mbox{\it rv\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf String}}})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it raise\/}(\mbox{\rm ``{\tt not implemented}''})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent

\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent

\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it s\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Unicode}}})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it i\/} = \mbox{\it s\/}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf I}}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{and}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast} = \rho\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize symbols}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it i\/} < \#\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\mbox{\it t\/}^{\ast}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\it i\/}}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\mbox{\it{in}\small \mbox{\bf SymTok}}(\mbox{\it SYM0\/})\newline

% tag::TE[]
\overline{\cal E}(\overline{\mbox{\it rv\/}}, \rho, \kappa) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf TRValue} \times \mbox{\bf Environment} \times \mbox{\bf TContinuation} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf Value*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
 \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\overline{\mbox{\it rv\/}}\in \mbox{\bf IVM}\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\kappa(\mbox{\it Environment\_after\_IVM\/}(\overline{\mbox{\it rv\/}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf IVM}}}, \rho), \langle \rangle )\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{let}}\:\mbox{\it v\/} = {\cal E}(\overline{\mbox{\it rv\/}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf RValue}}}, \rho)\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{in}}\: \setandincrindent
\:\mbox{\bf{if}}\:\mbox{\it is\_LST\/}(\mbox{\it v\/})\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{then}}\:\kappa(\mbox{\it Environment\_after\_LST\/}(\mbox{\it v\/}\!\downarrow_{\mbox{\scriptsize content}}\mid_{\mbox{\scriptsize \mbox{\bf Struct}}}, \rho), \langle \rangle )\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{else}}\:\kappa(\rho, \langle \mbox{\it v\/}\rangle )\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
\newline
\:\mbox{\bf{endif}}\: \decrindent
 \decrindent
% end::TE[]

\newline
% tag::TE*[]
\overline{{\cal E}^{\ast}}(\overline{\mbox{\it rv\/}^{\ast}}, \rho, \kappa) = $\`$ \mbox{\bf TRValue*} \times \mbox{\bf Environment} \times \mbox{\bf TContinuation} \rightarrow \mbox{\bf Value*}\newline
\:\: \setandincrindent
